name: Runestones
description:
You find yourself unsure of your life, your relationships and your path forward. You journey up and camp on a mountain and look to the mystic runestones for answers. Will the stones help you grow as a person?

Submission for the 2022 Kenney Game Jam | Theme: Growth 

*Note: Sorry the UI is kinda small!

Made in Unity with Unity Visual Scripting

Controls: LMB 

Assets: https://kenney.nl/assets (Public Domain)

Sounds: 

https://freesound.org/people/wretchedoctaves/sounds/645933/ (Public Domain)

https://freesound.org/people/ahriik/sounds/508110/ (Public Domain)

https://freesound.org/people/Kingcornz/sounds/342369/ (Public Domain)
